amendment.description: An amendment numbered 59 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funding for the United Nations unless specifically authorized by Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spartz amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 230 (Roll no. 316).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Spartz amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 230 (Roll no. 316).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
